text: When someone calls you a name you can try to overlook it and go on as if nothing happened, but it won't work. In my experience it's a relationship-ender. It may take you years to give up, or it could be instantaneous, but the friendship, if there ever was one, is over.
rawText: When someone calls you a name you can try to overlook it and go on as if nothing happened, but it won't work. In my experience it's a relationship-ender. It may take you years to give up, or it could be instantaneous, but the friendship, if there ever was one, is over.
